sentences.sContent: The city of Madrid soon plans to add a striking new structure that will “climatically transform” its urban architecture.
sentences.sContent_eng: The city of Madrid soon plans to add a striking new structure that will “climatically transform” its urban architecture.
sentences.sCn: 马德里市区计划修建一座醒目的建筑，此建筑还将在气候上改变城市的建筑格局。

words.tran: 气候的；气候上的；由气候引起的；受气候影响的
